Checkbox.name: GroupMining
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["If checked, you are in a Group (does not imply fleet). Unchecked, mining alone. This doesn't do anything yet."]

Checkbox.name: FleetUp
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["If checked, we are mining in a Fleet."]

Checkbox.name: FleetBoss
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We are in a Fleet, and we are Da Boss. Do not make more than one boss."]

Checkbox.name: TakeBreaks
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We should periodically take breaks. If there is a boss, only the bosses' setting will be respected."]

Textentry.Name: BreakHowOften
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How often do we take breaks, in minutes. Every hour and a half = 90 minutes. Why am I explaining this?"]

Textentry.Name: BreakHowLong
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How long will we break for, in minutes."]

Checkbox.name: UseIndustrialCore
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We are using our industrial core. This is so we know to grab fuel. Also if I ever set up rorquals that will be needed too. Also needed for Using a Compressor."]

Checkbox.name: UseCompressor
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We will use our compressor. This will be set up to work on demand, I might make another gimmick setting so you can leave the compressor on forever. But that sounds pretty stupid to me."]

Textentry.Name: UnitsHeavyWater
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many units of heavy water to carry in our Fuel Bay. Ensure this number actually fits please."]

Checkbox.name: MineAtLeader
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We will mine wherever Da Boss is. Do not select multiple mining location boxes."]

Checkbox.name: MineAtOreAnom
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We will mine at Ore Anoms. Do not select multiple mining location boxes."]

Checkbox.name: MineAtLocalBelt
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We will mine at local asteroid belts. Do not select multiple mining location boxes."]

Checkbox.name: MineAtBookmark
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["We will mine wherever a bookmark has the prefix in the textbox. Do not select multiple mining location boxes."]

Checkbox.name: JustMineIt
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["If this is checked, we will be ignoring all the hard work I put into ore prioritization. We will just mine whatever is in range of our mining tools. Ore prioritization is located in the MinerWorker minimode config page."]

Checkbox.name: UseMiningCrystals
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Use Mining Crystals, it isn't going to pick for you, select your crystal. Only one type at a time for now."]

combobox.Name: MiningCrystal2

Textentry.Name: HowManyMiningCrystals
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many units of our chosen mining crystal to put in cargo. Ensure this number actually fits please. Also, you shouldn't need too many."]

Checkbox.name: UseCommandBurstOne
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["First Command Burst Charge. Use if you are in a ship that boosts."]

combobox.Name: CommandBurst2

Checkbox.name: UseCommandBurstTwo
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Second Command Burst Charge. Use if you are in a ship that boosts."]

combobox.Name: CommandBlurst2

Checkbox.name: UseCommandBurstThree
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Third Command Burst Charge. Use if you are in a ship that boosts."]

combobox.Name: CommandBorst2

Textentry.Name: CommandBurstAmount
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many units command burst charges to put in cargo."]

Checkbox.name: UseDrones
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Check this if you'll be using drones to shoot small shit. This tells the bot to make sure to top off drones before running a Mining."]

combobox.Name: DroneType
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This configures the type of drone the bot will top off before a Mining."]

listbox.Name: MunitionStorage
listbox.OnSelect: Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mining.Config:SetMunitionStorage[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] switch ${This.SelectedItem.Text} { case Corporation Hangar UIElement[MunitionStorageFolderTitle@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:Show UIElement[MunitionStorageFolder@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:Show break case Personal Hangar UIElement[MunitionStorageFolderTitle@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:Hide UIElement[MunitionStorageFolder@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:Hide break }
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Use this field to configure where you would like Tehbot to unload ore."]

Text.name: MunitionStorageFolderTitle

listbox.Name: MunitionStorageFolder
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

Checkbox.name: HomeStructureIsCitadel
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that Home Structure is a Citadel"]

Checkbox.name: DropOffToContainer
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Check this if you want to unload ore station container."]

Textentry.Name: DropOffContainerName
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@MainMiningTab@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["The bot will unload all the ore to a station container with the specified name."]

Textentry.Name: WanderRangeLimit
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many meters will we go to get to our mineables?"]

Checkbox.name: OrbitRocks
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that we want to orbit the asteroid we are mining"]

Textentry.Name: OrbitRocksDistance2
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many meters should we orbit this rock at?"]

Checkbox.name: OrbitBoss
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that we want to orbit Da Boss"]

Textentry.Name: OrbitBossDistance2
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How many meters should we orbit Da Boss at?"]

Checkbox.name: AlignHomeStructure
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["If this is selected, we will immediately align to our home structure and mine until we are full / out of range / other things. If we get out of range we bookmark an asteroid to return to, warp out, and back."]

Checkbox.name: UseExperimentalAntiStick
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Experimental Anti Stick will, if you are stuck trying to warp too long, and if I ever finish coding it, warp you to a bookmark prefixed by the next box. If you don't make a bookmark it will try a star, and then different planets. Either you get out or you die."]

Textentry.Name: WarpInDistance
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Movement/Positioning/Misc@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Warp to mining site at how many meters?"]

Checkbox.name: FightNPCs
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that we want to not run from NPCs, and instead wait for DroneControl to do something about them. Enable DroneControl minimode or nothing will happe"]

Checkbox.name: RunFromBads
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Run away from bad people. Going to use LocalCheck for this for now, ensure the LocalCheck minimode is enabled."]

Checkbox.name: RunFromSuspicious
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["Provided I get around to coding it and can think up the exact criteria, this will have you treat people doing certain things as though they had bad standings and run from them."]

Checkbox.name: UsePOSHidingSpot
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that we want to run to a POS, like its the year 2008. The text box is the exact name of the POS bookmark."]

Textentry.Name: POSBookmarkName
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["The literal exact name of the Bookmark for the POS."]

Checkbox.name: UseWeirdNavigation
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["This indicates that we want to use Weird Navigation, which means we will warp to bookmarks prefixed by the text in the next box BEFORE we go to our safe spot. This will probably be most useful for your boosting ship so it doesnt land on the citadel with a weapons timer"]

Textentry.Name: HideHowLong
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Fleeing/Danger@MiningTabs@Tehbot_Mining_Frame@Tehbot_Mining]:SetText["How much time will we spend hiding after bad guys, in minutes."]

Checkbox.Text: Average Dark Ochre and Gneiss Deposit

Checkbox.Text: Average Hedbergite, Hemorphite, and Jaspet Deposit

Checkbox.OnLeftClick: Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mining.Config:setAverageSpodumainCrokiteandDarkOchrerDeposit[${This.Checked}] Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mining.AnomalyMasterCollection:Set["Average Spodumain, Crokite, and Dark Ochre Deposit",${This.Checked}]

Checkbox.Text: Large Dark Ochre and Gneiss Deposit

Checkbox.Text: Large Hedbergite, Hemorphite, and Jaspet Deposit

Checkbox.name: SmallHedbergiteHemorphiteandJaspetDeposit
Checkbox.Text: Small Hedbergite, Hemorphite, and Jaspet Deposit

Checkbox.name: SmallHemorphiteJaspetandKerniteDeposit
Checkbox.Text: Small Hemorphite, Jaspet, and Kernite Deposit

Checkbox.name: SmallJaspetKerniteandOmberDeposit
Checkbox.Text: Small Jaspet, Kernite, and Omber Deposit

Checkbox.name: SmallSpodumainCrokieandDarkOchreDeposit
Checkbox.Text: Small Spodumain, Crokite, and Dark Ochre Deposit
Checkbox.OnLeftClick: Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mining.Config:setSmallSpodumainCrokieandDarkOchreDeposit[${This.Checked}] Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mining.AnomalyMasterCollection:Set["Small Spodumain, Crokite, and Dark Ochre Deposit",${This.Checked}]
